LanguageData.ArchotechGiftQuest.questDescriptionRules: questDescription->[archotech_name] warmly embraces your minds, offering its human progenitors a choice of gifts.
LanguageData.SpaceSiteQuest.questDescriptionRules.rul:
questDescription->Using your ship's sensors, [worker_definite] has found [site_label] in a nearby orbit.

Unfortunately, the orbit is decaying and will lead to atmospheric re-entry in [timeoutTicks_duration]. Reaching the site will take [fuelCost]% of a shuttle's maximum fuel - be sure to bring enough for a return trip!

[allSitePartsDescriptionsExceptFirst]
LanguageData.SpaceSiteQuest.root.nodes.4.node.nodes.0: With a blazing streak across the upper atmosphere, the [site_label] plummeted to the planet below. Anything of value is now lost.
